description:
Employer Industry: Advertising Sales

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Competitive pay and bonuses
- Opportunity for career growth and advancement
- Chance to work with a diverse portfolio of clients in the finance industry
- Collaborative work environment with sales support staff
- High energy and dynamic work culture
- Ability to make a significant impact on revenue goals

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Represent the employer's portfolio to Financial Services clients, utilizing various ad products to achieve business goals
- Stay updated on the advertising marketplace and demonstrate expertise in the digital industry
- Understand clients' business challenges and provide advertising solutions
- Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and agency partners
- Contribute to the strategic mission of the sales team and exceed revenue goals

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Digital media sales experience with a proven track record of success
- Strong relationships within the finance industry
- Ability to work collaboratively with sales support staff
- Positive attitude, high energy, and passion for excellence
- Results-driven orientation and excellent client management skills

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- College degree in a related field
- Experience breaking accounts without prior spending history
